strings.Value: "Professor Eobald, I presume?"
"Hey, mite! Who are you?"
"Do you know Queen Bdaah?"
"What are you doing to these musicians?"
"Aren't you aware that centipedes get indigestion from music? Diarrhea from bards, too."
[Offer 10 rations] "Look how skinny those bards are. If you let them go, I'll give you a lot of good food instead."
"Get out of here before I cut your centipedes to pieces!"
[Attack] "Hold on, bards, we'll save you!"
"Whose bodies are these?"

{n}A group of young boys and girls play their lutes as a horde of centipedes surround them, swaying their horns and hissing to the tune. A fat mite stands nearby, listening to the strange concert with a blissful smile.{/n} "Muzak. Fine! Play, play!"
"Have mercy on them! Look at their fingers — they're bleeding!" {n}An old, gray-haired man begs the mite from among the musicians.{/n}
"Who can't play can be food sweet pedicents! No want be food? Keep play!"
"I Aesh, free shepherd! Walk around, shepherd herd... Best pedicents on all woods, ask anyone!"
"Don't know no queen! Aesh not bow to kings! Walk where want, is so!"
"Your {mf|Grace|Grace|Highness|Highness}? Linzi? Praise {g|Shelyn}Shelyn{/g}! I beg you, save us from this... music connoisseur!"
"Listen to muzak. Good muzak! I good, and pedicents good before meal!"
"No, no! Off, off! Back, sweeties! No listen them no-goods! Go, go!"
"Naaah. Lie. Muzak good. Bards tasty. You lie!"
"Yes, bags of bones, yes. Deal! Go, sweeties! Go honeys! Time eat!"
"No, skinny fine — meat fresh, warm!" {n}The mite licks his lips as he sizes you up.{/n}
{n}The mite leads the centipedes away, tenderly patting them on their backs as they go.{/n}
"Hey, hey! Why cut? Why so angry? Enough! Go, sweeties! Go, honeys! Nobody here like us!"
"You no like beasties? Angry you! I feed you pedicents — learn you!"
"Why know? Some bandits! First chase muzishuns with knives, then go at pedicents... Sure, we not refuse free food! Right, sweeties? Riiight!"
"More monsters. Didn't get them all."
{n}Octavia giggles and covers her mouth with her hand.{/n} "Oh... That's embarrassing! Of course, we have to help these poor fellows! But this concert... Ha ha ha!"
"I don't understand why you like talking to all these forest creeps so much. Let's just finish this stinking wretch and her insects and get out of here."

"Everyone is proud of what they have. A king, his crown; a merchant, their gold; a mite, their insects. Even a dirty kobold in a gutter takes pride in the dead rat he holds in his teeth... And truly, is there any essential difference between them?"
{n}The mite falls silent at the sound of a painful moan. Nok-Nok, unsuccessfully trying to cover his big ears, seems to be convulsing from the beautiful melodies.{/n} "Can't… bear it… die… soon… "
